attributes.action: Please Mr Cameron Close Our Borders so we do not suffer the same fate as Paris!
attributes.additional_details: Don't let hundreds of Britions die because of lack of competence of the Tory government!
attributes.background: I have started this petition off the back of the French presidents decision to close his borders to stop terrorists coming or going. We need to do the same and we need to do it now. Restrict travel when the terror threat is at its highest then lift restrictions as the terror threat reduces!
